title: Levi Strauss Reports Earnings Tomorrow. Here’s What to Expect.
text:
Levi Strauss & Co. is set to report fiscal third-quarter earnings Tuesday after the close of trading. Investors will be looking for updates on the 166-year-old denim-apparel maker’s strategy to expand beyond its core men’s jeans business and into new geographic regions. They’ll also look for progress on its direct-to-consumer push.

Levi went public on March 21, after pricing at $17 a share. The stock (ticker: LEVI) ended its first day at $22.42. It has struggled since, falling 13% through Friday’s close, to $19.31, while...
description: The jeans maker is expanding its catalog to include tops, outerwear, and other apparel, while appealing more to women shoppers.
